snippet.title: Age of Empires: The Age of Kings (DS) Gameplay (Hard AI)
snippet.description:
In this video I show the Age of Empires: The Age of Kings port for the Nintendo DS system. I play as the Saracens versus the Franks on the map "Nippon." Throughout this video I talk about the features of the game and my opinions on it while showing how to beat the AI on the Hard difficulty. 

My Civilization: Saracens
My Opponent's Civilization: Franks
Map: Nippon 
Game Type: 1v1, Empire Map, Conquest

Watch me stream these matches live at: http://www.twitch.tv/resonance22
Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Resonance22
Follow me on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Resonance22
